hypothesis_content.title: Post-Stress Memecoin Recovery: High Social Volume Leaders
hypothesis_content.statement: Following a STRESS regime event (crypto fear & greed index < 25 for 2 days), the memecoin with highest relative social volume increase during stress that maintained >80% of pre-stress price will lead recovery rally, outperforming BTC by >15% over 72 hours as speculative capital re-enters most resilient narrative.
hypothesis_content.rationale: During stress events, memecoins with sustained community engagement despite price pressure signal strongest conviction. These become focal points for speculative capital re-entry post-stress as traders seek asymmetric recovery plays.
entry_conditions: Crypto Fear & Greed Index increases from <25 to >35 (stress exit signal)
Identify memecoin from approved list with: highest social volume increase (7-day vs 30-day) during stress period AND price >80% of pre-stress level
BTC 24-hour price change positive but <3% (gradual recovery)
Regime transitions from STRESS to NEUTRAL

exit_conditions.take_profit: 25% gain or 15% outperformance vs BTC over 72 hours
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Return to STRESS regime (Fear & Greed <30) or selected memecoin drops below stress-period low

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Post-stress recovery favors BTC/ETH over memecoins entirely, or social volume leaders fail to translate engagement to price recovery.
